paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant 6174delT, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Diagnosed with prostate cancer, Gleason score of 7/10, had two uncles with prostate cancer.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: One carrier, diagnosed at age 56 with a Gleason score of 7/10, had two uncles with prostate cancer.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Diagnosed with prostate cancer, Gleason score of 9/10, had an uncle and a daughter with breast cancer.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The second carrier, diagnosed at age 76 with a Gleason score of 9/10, had no relatives with prostate cancer but had an uncle and a daughter with breast cancer.

functional_data.summary: The functional impact of the BRCA2:6174delT mutation is associated with increased risk of prostate cancer.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.population_frequency: Population frequency ~1% in Ashkenazi Jewish population.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on case reports and family history.
variants.additional_notes: The study found no other BRCA1 mutations.
key_quotes: We observed 2 BRCA2 6174delT mutations and no BRCA1 mutations.
One carrier had 2 uncles affected with prostate cancer, while the other had an uncle and daughter with breast cancer.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the BRCA2 variant was extracted accurately.
